Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
Contents can have non-trivial structure in OpenCms. While for most purposes the features described here suffice, OpenCms provides even more sophisticated features that may be useful in general or only from time to time.

Here, we provide an overview on such topics.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: We give an overview on advanced features you can use when writing your content type definitions.
